name: The Sun Doesn't Shine Here
description:
You're on an archeological expedition to the Lost City, and the sun doesn't shine here.

For Cosmic Horrors Jam and ECTOCOMP (Le Grand Guignol). Several dynamic endings, lots of dialogue. Be careful what you say.

Right arrow/space to advance dialogue. Arrow keys to select choices. Arrow keys to move.

Made with binksi (🤍). Shout out David, smwhr, and Stephen for the help.

Content Warnings
  • Everything you'd expect from cosmic horror
  • Tight spaces
  • Blood
  • Gore
  • Knives
  • Suicide
  • Death (stabbing, crushing)
